sentences.sContent: She raised her eyebrows in reproof.
...a reproof that she responded to right away.
sentences.sCn: ...她立即作出回应的责备言论。

remMethod.val: re + proof (证据) → 重新找到证据 → 再次斥责， 责备

trans.tranOther: If you say or do something in reproof, you say or do it to show that you disapprove of what someone has done or said
